action.action-desc: Mr. Ashford submitted the following resolution; which was referred to the Committee on Rules

form.official-title: Amending the Rules of the House of Representatives to require the Clerk of the House to conduct the election of the Speaker of the House by secret ballot.

section.text: This resolution may be cited as the Effective Leadership Elections for Congressional Trust Resolution.

section.header: Election of Speaker of House of Representatives by Secret Ballot
section.text: Clause 2 of rule II of the Rules of the House of Representatives is amended by adding at the end the following new paragraph:

rules-paragraph.text: The Clerk shall conduct the election of the Speaker by secret ballot.
